item.title: Items
item.description: Helm of the Night # Attunement Required: No Currently Held by: Kal Notes: 60 Feet Darkvision The Horde Sword: # Require Attunement: No Currently Held By: Kal Notes: Found in the elven undead crypt near Evermist. +2 bonus to attack and damage roles against orcs, half-orcs and orogs. Platinum Signet Ring # Attunement Required: Yes Currently Held By: Kal School of Magic: Abj/Div Notes: Found in Redbrand Hideout in the undead crypts.
